column5: Cozy spare bedroom with queen airbed. Overhead fan with dimmable light, plenty of closet space, and a locking door. There's a full bath in the hall with small essentials. You're welcome to use the kitchen or the washer & dryer.  Located off of Davis Blvd just north of I-820 & HWY 183, real close to NRH20 Water Park. Multi-purpose trail access just three house down.  You can park in the driveway or on the street.
column8: Guest room in North Richland Hills
